isis.stitle: VT-365 Diesel Engine Diagnostics (2002) - HARD START AND NO START DIAGNOSTICS - Test Procedures - Key On Engine Off Standard Test

svcproc.title: Key On Engine Off Standard Test
svcproc.para: To determine electrical malfunctions detected by the ECM self test and Output Circuit Check (OCC)

item.para: Electronic Service Tool (EST) with Master Diagnostics Software

warning.para: To avoid serious personal injury, possible death, or damage to the engine or vehicle, read all safety instructions in the foreword of this manual. Follow all warnings, cautions, and notes.

step1.para: Set parking brake for the correct signal from the Electronic System Controller (ESC).
Turn ignition key to ON. (Do not start engine.)

figure.caption: Key On Engine Off Standard Test

step1.para: Select Diagnostics from the menu bar.
Select Key On Engine Off Tests from the drop down menu.
From the Key On Engine Off Diagnostics menu, select Standard Test and click Run to start the test.
The ECM will complete an internal self-test and an Output Circuit Check (OCC). When the OCC is over, the diagnostic trouble code screen will show DTCs, if there is a problem.
Record all DTCs on Hard Start and No Start Diagnostics form.
See Appendix B in this manual for DTCs.

item.para: OCC fault for the IPR, glow plug relay, EGR valve, or EVRT™ control valve
